data.title: Shaw Shank Redemption
data.description: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

data.title: The God Father
data.description: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

data.title: Batman the Dark Knight
data.description: When the menace known as the Joker emerges from his mysterious past, he wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham, the Dark Knight must accept one of the greatest psychological and physical tests of his ability to fight injustice.

data.title: The God Father Part II
data.description: The early life and career of Vito Corleone in 1920s New York City is portrayed, while his son, Michael, expands and tightens his grip on the family crime syndicate.

data.title: Angry Men
data.description: A jury holdout attempts to prevent a miscarriage of justice by forcing his colleagues to reconsider the evidence.

data.title: Schindler's List
data.description: In German-occupied Poland during World War II, Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce after witnessing their persecution by the Nazi Germans.
